page.title: 15SOCIAL CONCERNS : THE AREAS
page.content: The area of our Domesday survey is a very varied one and we found different problems in 3 quite distinct sections, Queen's Park, Whitehawk and Kemptown.{Whitehawk}is a very large council estate which has had a bad reputation for vandalism and crime in the past and in which the housing was in need of repair, as is reported in the local press.{Queen's Park}is a middle-class residential area in which there are many large, well-kept Victorian houses around a well maintained park.{Kemptown}has some of the most elegant houses in Brighton but also many small flats and some delapidated property. The image of these regions which are very close to each other is very different but our survey found social concerns were not always the obvious ones.
